td.a: TEACHERS: TECH TIPS for Virtual Learning!

img.br: The Tech Teams from all of the schools have been working together to bring you this collection of helpful training documents.
Please refer to this document for the latest information from Pentucket.

One of the items we have been working on is a plan to be sure our families have access to meals and food during the shutdown of schools. There are multiple steps the district has taken to ensure that this occurs.
This wonderful video highlights moments of mindfulness in every school in the district and also shares research behind it. It brings important strategies for focus, and emotional regulation.
